text:
[Verse]
Raindrops falling down
City lights aglow
Dancing through the streets
Feel the rhythm flow

[Verse 2]
Splashing puddles wide
Laughing in the night
Neon colors shine
Everything so bright

[Chorus]
Dance in the rain tonight
Underneath the starry light
Feel the beat and lose control
Let the music take your soul

[Verse 3]
Umbrellas left behind
Hearts are beating fast
Living in the now
Making moments last

[Chorus]
Dance in the rain tonight
Underneath the starry light
Feel the beat and lose control
Let the music take your soul

[Bridge]
No plans no maps no time
Just let the raindrops chime
Free like the wind we twirl
Let’s dance and sway and whirl
title: Dance in the Rain
